Key Match Events: Two first-half headers, both of which were assisted by James Rodriguez, put Los Cafeteros up 2-0 at the break
Brighton winger Julio Enciso found the back of the net with a tidy effort in the 69th minute
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodriguez: What is this, 2016? What a showing from the ex-Real Madrid star.
Miguel Almiron: The Newcastle winger was non-existent across the match, failing to lead his attack as their established superstar.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia have not lost a match at the international level in more than two years.
Colombia will take on Costa Rica on June 28 in the next match of the Group Stage.
